seo.title: About Us | AI2You - Prompt Engineering
seo.description: Discover AI2You, the leading platform for structured prompts in marketing, business and technology.

hero.title: About Us:
hero.subtitle: Transforming the interaction between humans and Artificial Intelligence through precision engineering.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p1: At AI2You, we believe Artificial Intelligence is the most powerful tool of our era.
vision.p2: Our focus is to remove friction between humans and AI, delivering structured prompts that turn intention into results.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Simplify AI complexity so any professional can achieve expert-level results.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We create niche-based structured prompts, guiding AI with surgical precision.

branding.title: Why “AI2You”?
branding.description: AI for you. Every prompt follows Context, Task and Format pillars for predictable and scalable results.

cta.title: The Future Is Collaborative
cta.description: AI does not replace people. It amplifies capabilities when properly guided.
cta.note: Stop fighting technology. Master the results.

header.title: Our Mission:
header.subtitle: We are not just building tools; we are redesigning the way humans and machines collaborate to solve today’s most complex problems.

vision.title: Excellence in the Age of Intelligence
vision.p1: AI2You was born from the belief that Artificial Intelligence should not be a technical barrier, but an extension of human capability. Our mission is to build modern tools that act as a force multiplier for professionals across any industry.
vision.p2: From marketing to medicine, from programming to the legal sector, our prompt architecture and tools are designed to bring clarity where there is noise and efficiency where bureaucracy slows progress.

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.text: We focus on real-world pain points. Our solutions reduce hours of manual work into seconds of intelligent processing, adapting global frameworks to local needs.

vanguard.title: Technological Vanguard
vanguard.text: We track future trends in real time. Our platform evolves alongside the most advanced language models, ensuring our users never fall behind.

accessibility.title: Technical Accessibility
accessibility.text: We democratize access to state-of-the-art AI. Complex commands are transformed into intuitive interfaces, where great technology is quiet, seamless, and powerful.

manifesto.title: Impact, Not Noise.
manifesto.text: Our journey is about empowering the next generation of leaders, creators, and thinkers with AI-augmented intelligence, ensuring that technological progress always means human progress.

header.title: Privacy
header.subtitle: Full transparency and absolute protection in the handling of your information.

primary.title: Our Commitment
primary.description: At AI2You, privacy is not just a legal obligation, it is a core pillar of our engineering. This policy explains how we collect, protect, and use your data to deliver the best prompt engineering experience.

grid.title: Data Collection
grid.description: We collect only what is essential for our generators to function, such as niche preferences and technical logs used for performance optimization.

grid.title: Use of Information
grid.description: Your data is never sold. It is used exclusively to personalize your prompts and improve the accuracy of our AI models.

grid.title: Your Rights
grid.description: You remain in full control. At any time, you may request access to, correction of, or permanent deletion of your data from our systems.

footer.title: Questions about your security?
footer.description: Our Data Protection team is available via email:

header.title: Shall we build
header.subtitle: We are ready to hear your ideas, solve technical challenges, or simply talk about the future of AI.
